itunes:title: APR 08 2022 – U.S. ADMITS SPREADING DISINFORMATION ABOUT RUSSIAN CHEMICAL WEAPONS
title: APR 08 2022 – U.S. ADMITS SPREADING DISINFORMATION ABOUT RUSSIAN CHEMICAL WEAPONS
description:
The United States admits to spreading disinformation about Russian chemical weapons, with one U.S. official saying, “It doesn't have to be solid intelligence.” All of this as the reaction to the anti-grooming bill has brought to light misbehaviors from educators that target minors in the classroom. Meanwhile, service agents from the First Lady’s detail were placed on administrative leave after they associated with two men pretending to be Homeland Security Investigation agents, and Peter Thiel, entrepreneur and co-founder of PayPal, blasts Buffett, Dimon and Fink as “Finance Gerontocracy” at the 2022 Bitcoin Conference.


Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec 


Go to www.goodranchers.com/poso to get $30 off your order and free express shipping with code POSO


To save on MyPillow go to MyPillow.com/POSO and use code POSO 


For more on Turning Point USA's Socialism Sucks series, ‘China: The World’s Loan Shark’ go to https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6s4L1Q5yN04
